item.description:
Comics and Made Up Stories for Customer Discovery

Want to do customer discovery even faster? Want to keep your team laser focused on the most important aspects of customer problems and solutions? Want to jump start your solution design in ways that fit how users think and work?

Learn how you can do all that with two simple but powerful tools: scenarios and comics.

Even if you think you can't draw or don't consider yourself a storyteller, you'll learn techniques to quickly make useful six-sentence scenarios and six-frame comics. And you'll learn how you can use them in tight build-measure-learn loops.

What you learn to write and draw in this hands-on workshop probably won't earn you a literary award, but will likely help you and your teammates more quickly find an important customer problem and focus on the most important parts of a solution.


About the Speaker: Carl Seglem

Carl Seglem is a user experience (UX) designer who has worked on software for venture-funded and pre-funding startups. He's worn many hats, from technical sales to support to trainer to designer. He's used scenarios and comics at weekend startup events to enterprise big data software overhauls.
